page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content:
This is a rural area ,with two villages.A geological fault bisects the area,Bagworth to the N.lies on Coalmeasures,while Thornton stands on the ancient rocks of Charnwood Forest. The landscape,farming and character of the built up area is dictated by the geology.The Coalmeasures land supports a more intensive form of agriculture,and a varied industrial base;two coalmines,one disused,a clay quarry and brick yard and a number of small manufacturing units.Unfortunatly the pop.of this Victorian village has declined due to mining subsidence.In contrast,Thornton is an old farming community,which has expanded recently into a dormitory village.The reservoir with its new car parks & Trout Fishing now attracts many visitors.
It is an area of contrasts.
